content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 25, 2017 What is a Botnet Attack? 6 Ways to Identify and Prevent It July 25, 2017 Botnets have become a trend in 2022 and will likely continue to be a threat in 2023. According to Spamhauss Q4 2021 Botnet Threat Update, they reported there was a 23 increase in botnet CC attacks from Q3 to Q4 in 2021.
